key: Global scale for all crafting speeds. Must restart to take effect. Default: 1
translation: Глобальний масштаб для всіх швидкостей виготовлення. Необхідно перезапустити, щоб вступило в силу. Дефолт: 1

key: Global scale for all crafting resource costs. Must restart to take effect. Default: 1
translation: Глобальний масштаб для всіх витрат на виготовлення. Необхідно перезапустити, щоб вступило в силу. Дефолт: 1

key: Global marker, can only be set by users with title privilege.
translation: Глобальна мітка, може бути встановлена тільки користувачем з титульною привілегією.

key: Delay in minutes for the next searching nearby food location and moving spawn point
translation: Затримка в хвилинах до наступного пошуку найближчого місця з доступною їжею та переміщення точки відродження

key: When choosing a spawn point with nearby food, how far away can the food be?
translation: Як далеко може бути доступна їжа при виборі точки відродження?

key: When choosing a spawn point, this much food be nearby.
translation: Стільки доступної їжі повинно бути поруч при виборі точки відродження.

key: When true, spawn point stays as set below. When false, the spawn point will move periodically to be close to wild food.
translation: Коли ввімкнено, точка відродження залишається такою, як зазначено нижче. Інакше - точка відродження буде періодично переміщатися, щоб бути ближче до дикої їжі.
Кількість доступної їжі у точці відродження

key: Demographics are updated after this much time has passed.
translation: Демографія оновлюється після того, як пройшло стільки часу.

key: You were prevented from playing on this server by law:
translation: Вам заборонено грати на цьому сервері законом:

key: Were the items taken or put?
translation: Чи були предмети взяті чи покладені?

key: The currency in which the money was created.
A new currency created at a mint.
translation: Нова валюта створена на монетному дворі.

key: A trade between two players at a store.
translation: Торгівля в крамниці між двома гравцями.

key: Number of items in the transaction
Was the good bought or sold by the initiating player?
translation: Чи був товар куплений чи проданий гравцем?

key: The owner of the shop where the trade occurred.
Was this the first time they entered/left the demographic?
translation: Чи була це перша зміна демографії?

key: The owner of the deed on which the land was claimed.
Was the property claimed or unclaimed?
The bank account the tax came from.
translation: Банківський рахунок, з якого поступав податок.

key: The bank account the tax went to.
translation: Банківський рахунок, на який поступив податок.

key: The amount of the transaction which was taxed.
The bank account the funds came from.
The bank account the funds went to.
If it's an election for a title, this is the title.
translation: Якщо є голосування за посаду, ось посада.

key: The profession of the gained specialty.
The species of plant or animal.
The position of the new plant.
Destruction of a plant or animal, possibly yielding resources.
translation: Знищення рослини чи тварини, яка можливо приносить ресурси.

key: Currency used to pay the crafting fee.
translation: Валюта для оплати збору за виготовлення.

key: Amount paid in fee to craft.
The tag applied to the chat message.
How many seconds of time were just played.
Tons of carbon dioxide released into the atmosphere.
translation: Тонни вуглекислого газу виділені в атмосферу.

key: The time when the action takes place.
The position where the interaction took place.
The item used in the interaction.
{0}. You got for free from {1}. Tax: {2} ({3})

key:
This clause allows you to restrict its acceptance to only those that have a reputation equal to or greater than the defined amount.

There are two kinds of reputation you can specify here: 
 - {0}, which is the sum of all player's ratings, multiplied by a network effect.
 - {1}, which is the sum of the opinions from players you have rated favorably (and who they have rated favorably, etc).

You can review the reputations of all players on the server through the citizen list, which displays players in reputation order, and displays reviews from other players in the reputation tooltip.
translation:
Ця умова надає змогу ухвалювати договір лише тими, у кого репутація дорівнює або більше певного значення.

Тут можна вказати два види репутации: 
 - {0}, це сума рейтингів усіх гравців, помножена на мережевий эффект.
 - {1}, це сума думок гравців, яких ви оцінили позитивно (і тих, кого вони оцінили позитивно і т. д.).

Ви можете переглянути репутацію всіх гравців на сервері через список громадян, який відображає їх у порядку зростання репутації, а також відгуки інших гравців в поп-ап підказці по репутації.

key: This clause will grant permissions for a citizen to access an object or property.  The time of grant can be for the duration of the grant (temporary), or permanently, and can be given at the beginning or end of the contract.\n\nIf you need a player to deliver something in a private container, or build on private land, you'll need to set their permissions with this clause to ensure they have access.  Players accepting a contract should always ensure that they will receive the needed permissions to perform it.
translation: Ця умова надасть доступ громадянину до об'єкта чи властивості. Тривалість доступу можна встановити на протязі доступу (тимчасове), або постійно, і може бути додано до кінця або до початку договору.\n\nЯкщо вам потрібно, щоб гравець мав доступ до приватного контейнера, або будував на приватній землі, вам слід встановити їх дозвіл за допомогою цієї умови, щоб гарантувати їм доступ. Гравці, приймаючі договір, повинні завжди гарантувати, що вони отримають необхідні дозволи для його виконання.

key: Nested clause failed because all sub-clauses failed:\n\n{0}

key: This clause allows players to define in words what they would like done.  When using this clause, the contract can no longer be auto-approved, and the client will have to approve it before accepting it. When accepting a contract with a custom clause, it is wise to first review the reputation of the citizen offering it, because it is fully at their discretion to approve or deny its completion.\n\nYou must uncheck {0} at the bottom of the contract to use this clause.
translation: Ця умова дозволяє гравцям визначати словами те, що вони хотіли б зробити. При використанні цієї умови договір більше не може бути автоматично затверджений, і клієнтові доведеться його затвердити перед прийняттям. Приймаючи договір з користувацькою умовою, мудро спочатку розглянути репутацію громадянина, що пропонує його, тому що це повністю на його розсуд, схвалити чи відмовити його виконання.\n\nВи повинні зняти прапорець {0} в нижній частині договору, щоб використовувати цей пункт.

key:
This clause allows you to restrict the acceptance of a contract to only those that have a reputation equal to or greater than the defined amount.

There are two kinds of reputation you can specify here: 
 - {0}, which is the sum of all player's ratings, multiplied by a network effect.
 - {1}, which is the sum of the opinions from players you have rated favorably (and who they have rated favorably, etc).

You can review the reputations of all players on the server through the citizen list, which displays players in reputation order, and displays reviews from other players in the reputation tooltip.
translation:
This clause allows you to restrict the acceptance of a contract to only those that have a reputation equal to or greater than the defined amount.

There are two kinds of reputation you can specify here: 
 - {0}, which is the sum of all player's ratings, multiplied by a network effect.
 - {1}, which is the sum of the opinions from players you have rated favorably (and who they have rated favorably, etc).

You can review the reputations of all players on the server through the citizen list, which displays players in reputation order, and displays reviews from other players in the reputation tooltip.

key: This clause will grant the client authorization to the selected object or property.  Authorization can be granted temporarily for the length of the contract, or it can be given permanently. This permission can be given at either the beginning or end of the contract.\n\nIf you need a player to deliver something in a private container, or build on private land, you'll need to set their permissions with this clause to ensure they have access.  Players accepting a contract should always ensure that they will receive the needed permissions to perform it.
translation: This clause will grant the client authorization to the selected object or property.  Authorization can be granted temporarily for the length of the contract, or it can be given permanently. This permission can be given at either the beginning or end of the contract.\n\nIf you need a player to deliver something in a private container, or build on private land, you'll need to set their permissions with this clause to ensure they have access.  Players accepting a contract should always ensure that they will receive the needed permissions to perform it.

key: This clause provides a payment, with the option of collecting a deposit from the client.\n\nDeposits and payments are held in escrow for the duration of the contract. The amount in escrow is given to the client if the contract is successfully completed, or it goes to the client if the contract is marked as failed.
translation: This clause provides a payment, with the option of collecting a deposit from the client.\n\nDeposits and payments are held in escrow for the duration of the contract. The amount in escrow is given to the client if the contract is successfully completed, or it goes to the client if the contract is marked as failed.

Authorization can be granted temporarily for the length of the contract, or it can be given permanently. Players accepting a contract should always ensure that they will receive the needed permissions to perform it.

key: This clause provides a payment, with the option of collecting a deposit from the contractor.\n\nDeposits and payments are held in escrow for the duration of the contract. The amount in escrow is given to the contractor if the contract is successfully completed, or it goes to the client if the contract is marked as failed.
translation: This clause provides a payment, with the option of collecting a deposit from the contractor.\n\nDeposits and payments are held in escrow for the duration of the contract. The amount in escrow is given to the contractor if the contract is successfully completed, or it goes to the client if the contract is marked as failed.

key: Air pollution output is divided by this to determine PPM. It depends on AtmospherePressureKgPerM2 and the world area. For 1km2 and pressure 1kg/m2, 1 ton = 1PPM (part per million), which is the unit that determines climate change effects.
translation: Air pollution output is divided by this to determine PPM. It depends on AtmospherePressureKgPerM2 and the world area. For 1km2 and pressure 1kg/m2, 1 ton = 1PPM (part per million), which is the unit that determines climate change effects.

key: How much PPM (particles per million) will be added to/removed from atmosphere per one tone of matter (i.e. CO2).
translation: How much PPM (particles per million) will be added to/removed from atmosphere per one tone of matter (i.e. CO2).

key: Atmosphere pressure used in the atmosphere size formula. Trees absorb and pollution from tables produced in tons and converted to PPM by dividing on total atmosphere size. AtmosphereSizeInTons = WorldAreaInM2 * AtmospherePressureKgPerM2 where WorldAreaInM2 = (Dimensions.x * 10) * (Dimensions.y * 10). In example for 1km² (1000000m²) world with atmosphere pressure 1 kg/m² it will be 1000000 tons, resulting in 1 PPM per 1 ton of pollution or absorb (1 PPM =  1000000 * tons / AtmosphereSizeInTons), increasing pressure to 2 will result in 0.5 PPM per ton.
translation: Atmosphere pressure used in the atmosphere size formula. Trees absorb and pollution from tables produced in tons and converted to PPM by dividing on total atmosphere size. AtmosphereSizeInTons = WorldAreaInM2 * AtmospherePressureKgPerM2 where WorldAreaInM2 = (Dimensions.x * 10) * (Dimensions.y * 10). In example for 1km² (1000000m²) world with atmosphere pressure 1 kg/m² it will be 1000000 tons, resulting in 1 PPM per 1 ton of pollution or absorb (1 PPM =  1000000 * tons / AtmosphereSizeInTons), increasing pressure to 2 will result in 0.5 PPM per ton.

key: Your GPU has Max Tessellation Level less than 64. AMD is only known GPU manufacturer who doesn't follow the standard and reduces this setting to hack performance in their AMD Radeon Software" and sets it to 8 in default optimized settings. You may experience problems with Minimap rendering. To fix this just change "Max Tessellation Level" to 64 in the software for Eco (explicitly) and restart the game."
translation: Your GPU has Max Tessellation Level less than 64. AMD is only known GPU manufacturer who doesn't follow the standard and reduces this setting to hack performance in their AMD Radeon Software" and sets it to 8 in default optimized settings. You may experience problems with Minimap rendering. To fix this just change "Max Tessellation Level" to 64 in the software for Eco (explicitly) and restart the game."

key: Max active players allowed on the server, online or offline. 0 means unlimited allowed.  Determines the desired number of specialties per players. key: If set, students will be charged this amount upon enrollment, which will be held in Escrow until completion or unerollment, upon which it will be split with the teacher and the owner's bank account.  Students that leave class before completion will have a prorated amount refunded.  Students who have a partial education when joining will be charged a prorated tuition.
translation: If set, students will be charged this amount upon enrollment, which will be held in Escrow until completion or unerollment, upon which it will be split with the teacher and the owner's bank account. key: How old records can be grouped. It means it will try to process all last X days of records to group them. Usually you want to have this number low (1-2) in order to avoid process already processed records, but you can set high value (by example world age) in order to process at once all records from some old save with disabled grouping.
translation: How old records can be grouped. It means it will try to process all last X days of records to group them. Usually you want to have this number low (1-2) in order to avoid process already processed records, but you can set high value (by example world age) in order to process at once all records from some old save with disabled grouping.

key: Max count of records that will be proccesed at once hourly. For reference, server with 100 players may reach 1.000.000 records per day. Usually 500.000 (default) should be ok, but you may want to tweak it if you have incredibly big count of records or if you are facing lag while it groups records.
translation: Max count of records that will be proccesed at once hourly. For reference, server with 100 players may reach 1.000.000 records per day. Usually 500.000 (default) should be ok, but you may want to tweak it if you have incredibly big count of records or if you are facing lag while it groups records.

key: Most recent records wont be processed in order to have more exact values for laws like 'Users who in last 1 hour claimed plots ...'. You may want to tweak this value to increase this support.
translation: Most recent records wont be processed in order to have more exact values for laws like 'Users who in last 1 hour claimed plots ...'. You may want to tweak this value to increase this support.
